code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const API_BASE='http://localhost:4001/todo';function TodoItem(props){const{name,id,completed,setItems}=props;const deleteTodo=async id=>{try{const response=await fetch(API_BASE+"/delete/"+id,{method:"DELETE"});if(!response.ok){throw new Error("Faild to delete a task");}const data=await response.json();setItems(items=>items.filter(item=>item._id!==data._id));}catch(error){console.error("Error updating task status:",error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"todo"+(completed?" check-complete":""),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"checkbox"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text",children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"delete-todo",onClick:()=>deleteTodo(id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"X"})})]},id);}export default TodoItem;
